mapper.sql: id, equipment_id, if_down, down_reason, down_time, recovery_time, key_bord, teller, printer, create_time, banknote_box_status, network_status, trans_status, running_status, module_status, prr_status, cim_status, connect_status, maintain_status
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_equipment_faul_log
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_equipment_faul_log (id, equipment_id, if_down, down_reason, down_time, recovery_time, key_bord, teller, printer, create_time, banknote_box_status, network_status, trans_status, running_status, module_status, prr_status, cim_status, connect_status, maintain_status ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifDown,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{downReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recoveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{keyBord,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{teller,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{printer,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{banknoteBoxStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{networkStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{transStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{runningStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{moduleStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{prrStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cimStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{connectStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{maintainStatus,jdbcType=CHAR} )

equipment_id = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

cim_status = #{cimStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tb_equipment_faul_log set equipment_id = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, if_down = #{ifDown,jdbcType=CHAR}, down_reason = #{downReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, down_time = #{downTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, recovery_time = #{recoveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, key_bord = #{keyBord,jdbcType=CHAR}, teller = #{teller,jdbcType=CHAR}, printer = #{printer,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, banknote_box_status = #{banknoteBoxStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, network_status = #{networkStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, trans_status = #{transStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, running_status = #{runningStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, module_status = #{moduleStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, prr_status = #{prrStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, cim_status = #{cimStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, connect_status = #{connectStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, maintain_status = #{maintainStatus,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from tb_equipment_faul_log where equipment_id = #{equipmentId} and down_time != '' ORDER BY create_time desc limit 0,1

select tefl.equipment_id "equipmentId",
sum(CASE when tefl.banknote_box_status = '2' then 1 else 0 END) "banknoteBoxCount" ,
sum(CASE when tefl.printer = '2' then 1 else 0 END) "printerCount" ,
te.country country,
te.detail_address detailAddress
from tb_equipment_faul_log tefl,tb_equipment te where te.id = tefl.equipment_id GROUP BY tefl.equipment_id HAVING banknoteBoxCount>0 or printerCount>0
